## serialization.variables.VariableSerializer.load() method

Deserializes the variable defined by the given state into the given workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(state: IVariableState[], workspace: Workspace): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | [IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate_interface.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The state of the variables to deserialize. |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) | The workspace to deserialize into. |

**Returns:**

void
